## Intro
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(qvalue)
```

Read in sQTLs

```{r}

sQTLs <- fread("cat ../code/QTLs/QTLTools/polyA.Splicing/PermutationPassChunks/0.txt ../code/QTLs/QTLTools/polyA.Splicing/PermutationPassChunks/1.txt")


sQTLs %>%
  mutate(q = qvalue(adj_beta_pval)$qvalues) %>%
  filter(q < 0.1)

```
